AboutMe.title: Who Am I?
AboutMe.content: Hi, my name is Tomasz Jelito and I'm a full-stack web developer from Poland. Programming is my passion. I enjoy working with creative people and learning new things. I love sport and travelling.

MyCompetence.title: Experience
MyCompetence.description1: First commercial projects as a full-stack web developer
MyCompetence.description2: During this time I gained a lot of knowledge and did two internships
MyCompetence.description3: I spent hundreds of hours learning the basics of C++ and algorithms from youtube

WhatDoIDo.description1: Design, development, hosting, support and management
WhatDoIDo.description2: Everything tailored to your needs and requirements
WhatDoIDo.description3: Working with other freelancers to provide top quality

CallToAction.title: Got a job for me?
CallToAction.description: Are you looking for a freelancer to develop your new website? Or maybe you need an extra programmer on your team?

PortfolioProjects.title: Check out my recent projects
PortfolioProjects.agency_description: A demonstration website for a Digital Marketing Agency. For the frontend, I used Next JS and Mantine UI. For the backend, I used Django and PostgreSQL. Everything connected through a REST API.
PortfolioProjects.portfolio_description: My personal website you are looking at right now. For this project I used Next JS and Mantine UI.
PortfolioProjects.akademia_description: Website for a local volleyball academy - "Akademia Siatkówki Dembończyk / Wójtowicz". One of my first commercial projects. This website is based on the Wordpress system.
PortfolioProjects.akupunktura_description: Akupunktura Joanna Jelito. Website with appointment booking for acupuncture office. This website is based on Wordpress system.
PortfolioProjects.kniha_description: Jakub Knihinicki - Badminton instructor. Simple website for badminton player and instructor. This website is built using HTML and CSS only.
PortfolioProjects.crisis_coriddor_description: The winning game of Zegluga Game Jam 2023
PortfolioProjects.sudoku_description: Simple sudoku game made with python and tkinter
PortfolioProjects.algorithms_description: This repo contains my implementations (mainly based on book "Introduction to algorithms") of basic algorithms.
PortfolioProjects.qi_description: Demo Wordpress website for a Chinese medicine salon.

ProductsPreview.title: Find your solution
ProductsPreview.description: Do you want to build a website that will help you reach new customers and grow your business? Write to me what you need, I'll help you find the recipe for the success.
ProductsPreview.description1: Show what you do, where people can find you and how to contact you
ProductsPreview.description2: Allow your clients to book their appointments conveniently
ProductsPreview.description3: Sell your products online, reach new customers and increase your sales
ProductsPreview.description4: Need something special? Write to me

CookieConsent.title: Cookie Notice
CookieConsent.description: This website uses essential cookies for theme, language preferences, and traffic analytics. By continuing to use the site, you consent to the use of these cookies.
